website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those who don't want to choose between heels and boots in cold weather.
pros: 1-inch wedge for those who want some added height
Micro-fleece lining helps keep you warm on cold days
cons: Boots can run a bit narrow, especially if you're wearing thick socks

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: They’re supper cute and comfortable. Delivery was on time and nicely packaged. The look just as pictured and are well made. I normally wear a 71/2. I was a little histant to purchase a 71/2 based on some reviews mentioning that they run small. However I decided to go with my instinct because these are not my first pair of shoes from the brand. I’m glad I went with the 71/2 the 8 would’ve been way to big. The 71/2 has enough space for thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE !
customer_reviews.text: BUY THESE! I bought these and happened to find the exact same pair in all black from DSW (For more than half the price) BUT worth every penny! I am from TN and this year we got A TON of snow! these are warm and so comfortable and even more adorable! I get compliments ALL the time!
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rain boot bad and I didn’t want one of those all rubber floppy cold rain boots that tend to get a leak. Luckily when it was time to tell my boyfriend what I want for Xmas this was on the top of my list. Super convenient he was able to get them on amazon! I got the dark brown and lighter brown boot and the colors are great! I also usually wear a 6 in sperrys and these in a 6 fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: This is a great boot. I wore them in Scotland when it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot. I wore them in Scotland when it was 40 degrees and raining. My feet stayed dry and warm without getting too hot. For me they ran half a size too large, even with boot socks. I would definitely allow for some breaking in time. The leather is pretty soft but the spot on the shoe where the rubber meets the leather takes some breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these. Very warm, very soft and comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Nice quality and would definitely buy them again. Thanks forth great price!
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Work Boot for Women
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! These are perfect for yard work and running errands during the cold and wet months. We recently had to move in the rain and they were perfect for this! Super comfy. Considering the work I had to do in them, I was really surprised my feet weren't achy. Also keep feet super warm!
customer_reviews.author: kiristen biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute, comfy, and great quality as expected. No idea why some people say they are hard. They are boots and you want them to stay to form. They aren't sneakers. That being said, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Cute to the Eye....but as hard as bricks!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, narrow, heavy & no inner support...hard as a rock.. Returned after trying on....sooooo sad....too bad, the look of these shoes are stylish!!
customer_reviews.author: TheBall

customer_reviews.title: Toe box runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to wear on an Alaskan cruise. Unfortunately for me, the tool box was too narrow for my foot and the hell was so hard it hurt an Achilles tendon that causes me problems from time to time. I ordered a half size larger, but the width was so tight I could barely get them on without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wyss

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots leave adequate room for socks and are comfy as well as attractive. I received several compliments the first day.
customer_reviews.author: DMS4878

customer_reviews.title: Cute, mostly practical
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfortable. My only complain is they’re kind of wide in the leather part (ankle up), so there’s no support, and trying to tighten them with the laces looks goofy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Deach

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love these but the fit was off-tight on top of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love these but the fit was off-tight on top of toes and heel slips out. They are super cute so I am bummed.
customer_reviews.author: wildflowermomma

customer_reviews.title: Quaility is exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe for my mother and she loves it. The quality and workmanship is impeccable. I plan on buying myself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love! Super cute and I wear them every day. Super comfortable. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually a bit different than described (leather not quilted) but they are just what I was wanting!
customer_reviews.author: Chy Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: They come in 1/2 sizes !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots.. way too cute and very comfortable They appear to be well made. I wear a size 9.5 M and the sizing is perfect with a medium weight sock. Taking them to Ireland, if you don't hear from me again they were a success !
customer_reviews.author: susan bobes

customer_reviews.title: Might not be the same style you ordered...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the shoes enough to keep them, but beware that they may not be the style you ordered and give yourself time to return/reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfortable Feet!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a tad small, but very comfortable. I put them on to shovel snow. My feet stood warm and dry. I do recommend you tie them tight so snow or rain doesn’t go in. Other than that they are great. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the zipper - I thought they ran a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: kkzick

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, warm, perfect fit, super handy when it rains. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: This boot is adorable on and insulated well. I bought myself and my mother a pair. We both love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Nak

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these boots! My go-to footwear during raininy winter months!
customer_reviews.author: CRP34

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! Was a bit undecided at first but as soon as I put them with a casual/comfy outfit I was sold! Would definitely buy again! Very comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle boot with style
customer_reviews.text: Love how these boots are stylish and functional. The lace-up on the side just gives it a little something special. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them! They are true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are true to size, but if I were to wear super thick socks I’d probably go a half size up. It rubs a little bit on my right pinky toe but I think that’s just because they aren’t broken in. But basically I loooove then.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Garnand

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I paid too much but they are still great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boot. Very comfortable. I normally wear a 6.5 or 7 but ordered these in a 6 & they fit perfect! The color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not For Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the are very nice looking and seem to be made well. But they are not for wide, even slightly feet. It is also very stiff and heavy. My foot is slightly wide with small bunions. I usually wear 9M to 9W depending on the design and/or brand.
customer_reviews.author: EAR

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these boots! I bought them to take on our 2 wk trip to Alaska and so glad I did. I usually wear a 8.5-9 shoe and purchased 8.5 in these. They were still a little big, but I wore thick hiking socks with them and it was fine. They kept my feet warm and dry. They are very comfortable too. There were a few days I wore them all day with no problems. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Water proof and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and very comfortable. Constantly getting compliments and questions about my boots. Sperry shoes have never been less than perfect🤓
customer_reviews.author: Starbuck2277

customer_reviews.title: Clunky but good for rainy days
customer_reviews.text: They are a little clunky, but overall I’m happy with the look. Work great for rainy days where I don’t want to get other shoes dirty. The zipper in the back makes them easy to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D

customer_reviews.title: A great rainy day or just everyday boot when it’s chilly out. Super cute & comfy too.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They’re easy to put on. I leave them tied & unzip the back to slip my feet in. I’ve probably worn them every day since I got them in November & they are very warm. I wear a 6.5-7 size shoe depending on the brand. A 6.5 in this shoe fits perfect for me & there’s still a bit of room to wear a thicker sock but like I said they are very warm so I just wear a thinner sock & my feet don’t get cold. I’ve gotten lots of complements, too. They look cute with skinny jeans tucked in. Waterproof. Comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose boots!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boots and exactly what I was looking for. I wore these boots in Iceland to keep my feet warm and dry in September. We walked a lot and did quite a bit of hiking. These boots were perfect and so comfortable! Great quality for the price and I love the look of these.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this boot but runs large
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots but they definitely run large. I consistently wear a 6.5 but ordered a 7 because I figured I'd need a bit of extra room for heavy socks. The 7 was huge. Sent back the 7 and ordered a 6.5, which fits much better but I think I could have even ordered a 6.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They were delivered to my office this afternoon and I wore them the rest of the day (casual attire allowed). I had several compliments. It just happened to be a rainy day. They're very comfortable and I love the zipper in the back.
customer_reviews.author: P. Castine

customer_reviews.title: Makes weird noises
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for rainy weather, but is really noisy when walking indoors. Fits bigger than expected, too. Does the job, so not returning, but would’ve ordered something else if I had known.
customer_reviews.author: SGR

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking boot but was too narrow for my foot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking boot but was too narrow for my foot. Would have reordered but did not have a wide. Did not like to pay the restocking fee and pay for shipping. I will not order from a 3rd party again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The first times I wore these they were snug but after a few wears they have conformed to my foot. They do extremely well in the rain and are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these booties. Very comfortable. Bought my normal size 7.5 and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They fit as I expected and are great for slipping your feet in and out of without having to untie them... And they look good 😁
customer_reviews.author: PatriotAcres, LLC

customer_reviews.title: They're nice and wide so if you have a wide foot ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and fit just right. They're nice and wide so if you have a wide foot like mine they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Room!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! My normal size is between 9.5 and 10. I sized down to 9.5 due to other reviews and so glad I did! The interior is lined. Add a pair of thick winter socks and there’s still plenty of wiggle room! Comfortable enough to wear ALL day.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping that I could just slip them on but it is not that easy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep and the shoes are difficult to get on without untying the laces. I was hoping that I could just slip them on but it is not that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to break these in - the zipper on the back gave me a few big blisters even after wearing them 4-5x. I expected more comfort from a Sperry shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Russell

customer_reviews.title: May be too stiff for some
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ended up hurting my ankles and lower leg. The material is very stiff. I loved the style.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite winter shoes. I will be buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: hkelly

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Fit well, look cute and keep me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sara May

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Too big, my feet and ankles were swimming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable and Functional!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these boots so far. They are very cute and stylish yet also comfortable and functional. These boots are nice and waterproof and great for our awful Chicago winters. I will say I got a half size bigger than I would normally get since I wanted to leave room for socks. They fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved my new boots during the recent cold Alabama rainy weather, WARM and DRY!
customer_reviews.author: working mother

customer_reviews.title: Great boots with only one con.
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and true to size. Only con is that the soles are very squeaky on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rostick

customer_reviews.title: Bit small but great boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots, I’m happy I bought a size up from what I normally wear as I thought I would wear woolly socks with it but I can’t as the sizing was a good fit with just normal socks. Still a great boot
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! Fast shipping and fits perfect. I usually wear 71/2 but got a 7 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife as a gift and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: These boots are adorable but I found them to run small
customer_reviews.text: These boots are adorable but I found them to run small. I wear a six and after the 6 and 6.5 had to be sent back for being small I gave up and moved on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: I love them, very comfy and also very cute
customer_reviews.text: I lived in these during winter! I love them, very comfy and also very cute!
customer_reviews.author: William Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase! They are really warm and perfect for snowy or rainy weather. Really comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy these boots! Great arch support and they are very comfortable! I usually wear between a 9 & 9 1/2 so I got the 9s. haven’t tested them out in rain or snow yet, but they seem very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Erekson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size but very uncomfortable the sides are very hard on my feet. Cute thou
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so happy with her present! We couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Faye Nankivell

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and warm and perfect for the wet, snowy days.
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as represented. They fit perfectly and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanmarie Morey

customer_reviews.title: our bad weather was pretty much over by the time they ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really worn them outside yet, our bad weather was pretty much over by the time they arrived....looking forward to the next storms though! I tried them on in the house and they'll be fine....thanks for asking. Millie
customer_reviews.author: Bob Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Wear them all the time. Check for defects.
customer_reviews.text: Missing part of padding inside so Amazon gave me a partial refund. Will look at getting this fixed at a shoe repair shop nearby. True to fit and true there is no break-in period. So very comfortable than any other boot I have. Would buy this brand again. I got a size 10 and they fit perfectly. I used to have wider feet but back down to normal size and they are fine. Could wear normal to slightly thicker socks, but not any more. They are so padded you don't need to.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Something in the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Something was poking my foot and could not where are them which was a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only complaint otherwise I love them!
customer_reviews.text: They tie in front but in the pic of the shoe it shows a no tie shoe. only complaint otherwise I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Hyche

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a gift bought from Amazon and I love these boots!!!! They are super comfortable and warm!! I usually wear an 8.5 or 9 and based on others reviews I asked for the 8.5. The fit is perfect with enough room for slightly thicker socks and an extra insole. I have narrow feet and a higher arch. The boots fit like a glove. I originally received some Keen boots for Christmas and found them to be too wide and not as padded. Besides my Ahnu hiking boots, these are awesome!!! I haven't tested them in the rain, but will update once I do.
customer_reviews.author: O Family

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, well made and fashionable duck boots finally! Runs small & narrow in the foot bed.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well constructed boot however they do run very small and narrow in the footbed. I always wear a 6 sometimes 6.5 to have room for socks and the 6 was small and narrow, it squished my pinky toe but my feel are normal-slightly wide. A 6.5 would probably be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RFB48

product_meta.title: Sperry Women's Saltwater Wedge Tide Rain Boot
